column2: Proportion of Adults without a level 2 qualification or are in training
Dataset shows the proportion of adults without a full level 2 qualification (5 GCSE) and those who are in training
Dataset shows the proportion of adults without a full level 2 qualification (5 GCSE) and those who are in training or have been within the last 4 weeks.
No additional calculations have been performed and the dataset has been presented as found.
